messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] time limits
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/29/02 9:02:41 PM, kbcdlovejo@aol.com writes: ... Bad attitude. Lose the time limit. Or maybe give it six YEARS and then get back to us!
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/29/02 9:02:41 PM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:

<< Carol wrote:
> I will take your advise and give
> it 6 months.
>
Bad attitude. Lose the time limit. Or maybe give it six YEARS and then get
back to us! <g> >>

Hey, that was MY advice! GOOD attitude! <bwg>

(I assume before six months are up nobody's counting anymore.)
(And I'm guessing, Kelly, you missed some of the thread.)

Sandra
